page.title: 06Family Sunday in Ponteland
page.content: {Sunday }is usually a quieter day when many families stay at home and relax. A Sunday newspaper is much thicker than a daily paper and the man of the house enjoys having time to read it. In some families one or two members will go to church.In many homes each person gets their own breakfast when they get up.Dinner is a hot meal which is cooked by the mother of the family. She may be helped by her children. There may be a joint of meat roasted in the gas or electric oven,served with vegetables cooked in a pan in boiling,salted water.These may be peas,carrots,cauliflower or cabbage. {Pets }are kept by many families.They are tame animals kept for the pleasure of the owners.Dogs are the most popular pet,the second being cats followed by budgerigars kept in a cage Goldfish are kept in water with gravel
